message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this revised offer works for you.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, I can't go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know your thoughts.
